import React from 'react'; import './Profile.css'; const Profile = ({ user }) => { // Get user data from localStorage const userData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) || {}; return (

My Profile

{userData.email || 'user@example.com'}

Daily calorie needs

Personal Information

Name

Email

Member Since
October 2025
); }; export default Profile;
